main event: Several residents of Kadena AFB in Okinawa, Japan observed an unidentified object in the sky on September 20, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5-10 seconds and was described as a circular, white to amber colored object with a surrounding glow.
The object exhibited erratic flight, pausing overhead and then continuing in a straight direction.
The object was estimated to be traveling at an extremely fast speed, comparable to a jet interceptor, but made no sound.
Multiple observers witnessed the object on several occasions over a period of time, with the object appearing and disappearing at regular intervals.
The report notes that the object could not be explained and the cause was unknown.
